title: E-mail marketing - Little Rock
description:
Software that automatically sends email marketing to all registered customers.

The emails are sent via Amazon SES, which allows us to send thousands of emails at a very high price fairer than other similar services.

In all emails the 5 most viewed requests from the site are also sent, and this happens without any human interaction.

This is a 100% automated email marketing.

title: Income Statement
description:
Script that crosses data from several tables of a database, applies various business and financial rules in order to generate a weekly report for the company's managers.

The current result is sent in the email. current month, all expenses in hierarchy, checklist of releases, reports for auditing and detailing of the result and expenses by customer and by partner.

The script also generates automatic alerts in case there is loss in any sector.

title: Program - Integration - Logistics Movements - Tracking
description:
Every logistics company needs to send all order movement data to their respective customers (contractors).

And the big problem is that each customer has a different format to receive this information, so it's over spending a lot of development time

To solve this problem, I developed an integrator software. We just set up a new client on it (the process takes 2 minutes), and after that the software will adapt to the format and method of sending the client automagically.

Type of files supported
  • EDI
  • JSON
  • XML
  • CSV
Upload Type Supported
  • API
  • Webservice
  • E-Mail
  • FTP
